author: amaltaro
body:
This upgrade is needed in order to get CouchDB replication working between WMAgent and central couch deployed on kubernetes.

Apparently the TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 was added in R15B02:
https://www.erlang.org/downloads/R15B02

but given that couch 1.6.1 support up to R17, I decided to push it to the newest possible version, release notes here:
https://www.erlang.org/downloads/R16B03-1

Further tests still need though.
title: Update erlang to R16B03-1, support TLS 1.1 and 1.2
